duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop the Enterprise Data Program by working with IT leadership in implementing modern data platform strategy, methodologies, programs, processes, standards, organizational structure, metrics, and data structures.
Collaborate with senior IT leadership and senior business to drive and deliver strategic data programs across the organization.
Define and implement data and analytic strategies and roadmaps, driving and enabling data capabilities.
Identify new data platforms and technologies to deliver the enterprise data needs.
Oversee the delivery of conceptual end-to-end platform artifacts and facilitate programs for Data Platform Governance, Data Quality, Data Security, and Data Platform usage standards and patterns.
Ensure alignment of enterprise data platform architecture with business and technology strategy needs and roadmaps by communicating to business and technology partners.

Define and establish a technical strategy, standards, and guidelines in the data platform architecture domain in collaboration with other architects and mentor technical leaders on modern data architecture practices.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field of study and a minimum of 8 years of experience in architecture/design in relevant technology disciplines; or any combination of education and experience.
